page.title: 17BILLERICAY NW Schools 2.
page.content: All 4 schools are well equipped and have excellent facilities. As well as possessing a fine{playing field, Brightside Infant/Junior Schools have their own{swimming pool,}paid for by parents.{Clubs}in the Junior School include sports, country dancing, stamp collecting and music. Parents help the Infants with swimming, baking and sowing. Buttsbury Junior is well_known for its{Sport, Music, Poetry}and{Drama.} Classes go to Mayflower school for swimming. In the Infant School, amenities include a TV room and the{ {library,}which parents help to run. Children from the Junior School normally go to{Mayflower School}at the age of 11. There is also a private school,{St. {John's,}which caters for children up to the age of 18.
